scan_metadata.description: workspaces - Compliance Functions Mapping - OPTIMIZED VERSION
scan_metadata.optimization_notes: Intelligently categorized functions by cloud security expert analysis, grouped by service, simplified to 4 clear categories with execution types and remediation effort classification

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - Checks if volume encryption is enabled
check_functions.description: Ensures WorkSpaces volume encryption is enabled

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - Checks VPC subnet and NAT configuration
check_functions.description: Validates VPC has 2 private and 1 public subnet with NAT

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - Checks if MFA is enabled for users
check_functions.description: Ensures MFA is enabled for WorkSpaces users

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - Checks volume encryption settings
check_functions.description: Validates volume encryption settings for WorkSpaces

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - Checks VPC deployment settings
Code Executable - Checks if web access is disabled
check_functions.description: Ensures web access is disabled for WorkSpaces

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - Checks CloudWatch setup for WorkSpaces
check_functions.description: Validates CloudWatch setup for WorkSpaces monitoring

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - Checks image CIS benchmark compliance
check_functions.description: Ensures WorkSpaces image meets CIS benchmark

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - Checks approved bundle versions
check_functions.description: Validates approved bundle versions for WorkSpaces

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - Monitors image age for WorkSpaces
check_functions.description: Checks for WorkSpaces images older than 90 days

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - Checks inbound traffic on interface ports
check_functions.description: Validates inbound traffic settings for interface ports

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - Checks FIPS endpoint encryption settings
check_functions.description: Ensures FIPS endpoint encryption is enabled for WorkSpaces
